instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00163: What is 820-00163? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> restarting on charge power only
threads.message:
Hi, got an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> that restarts on 10% apple loading screen when connected only to charger. If i connect both the battery and charger or even only the battery alone it boots fine.

Tried different 85w chaerges, different DC IN board, different SSDs but nothing

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> restarting on charge power only
threads.message:
Test starting in SMC bypass mode.
You may have GPU issue, or FDMF6808N problem.
